actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to canned pineapple fruit entered between July 1, 1996, and June 30, 1997.

summary.text: Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to canned pineapple fruit.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to canned pineapple fruit entered between July 1, 1996, and June 30, 1997.
